note:
Yiddishe mama, union member, writer, wellpern, all pronouns accepted

Image descriptions:

Avatar - my kid's illustration of the head of a flying fox (a kind of bat) in black, brown, and gold hanging upside down against a leafy green background

Header - Global Bio Stripes, ranging from kelly green on the left through yellow in the center to pale gray on the right, showing the decline of wildlife from 1970 to 2018 (based on data from Living Planet Index)
